title: A poem on St. James's Park as lately improved by His Majesty. Written by Edmund Waller, Esq;
author: Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687.
publisher: printed [by Thomas Ratcliffe and Edward Mottershead] for Gabriel Bedel and Thomas Collins at the Middle-Temple-Gate,
notes: An earlier, unauthorized edition was published with title "On the park at St. Jamese's" (Wing W504).
Separate poem begins p. 11 with caption title "Of our late war with Spaine..."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
